mapper.insert: insert into cdm_trans_detail (cust_id, date_time, tran_id, card_no, tran_type, tran_cat, tran_msg, tran_amount, tran_cureen, acct_avaibala, act_name, remit_type, opp_actno, opp_cardno, opp_actname, opp_brname, opp_brno, tran_amountcny, mer_no, mer_name, rembak, usage_name, tran_ps, summary, sum_flag, edit_flag, sys_code) values (#{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tranId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tranCat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tranMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tranCureen,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{acctAvaibala,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remitType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oppActno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppCardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppActname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppBrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oppBrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranAmountcny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rembak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sumFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update cdm_trans_detail set card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_type = #{tranType,jdbcType=CHAR}, tran_cat = #{tranCat,jdbcType=CHAR}, tran_msg = #{tranMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_amount = #{tranAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tran_cureen = #{tranCureen,jdbcType=CHAR}, acct_avaibala = #{acctAvaibala,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, act_name = #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remit_type = #{remitType,jdbcType=CHAR}, opp_actno = #{oppActno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opp_cardno = #{oppCardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opp_actname = #{oppActname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opp_brname = #{oppBrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opp_brno = #{oppBrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_amountcny = #{tranAmountcny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mer_no = #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mer_name = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rembak = #{rembak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usage_name = #{usageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_ps = #{tranPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum_flag = #{sumFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_flag = #{editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=CHAR} where cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and date_time = #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_id, date_time, tran_id, card_no, tran_type, tran_cat, tran_msg, tran_amount, tran_cureen, acct_avaibala, act_name, remit_type, opp_actno, opp_cardno, opp_actname, opp_brname, opp_brno, tran_amountcny, mer_no, mer_name, rembak, usage_name, tran_ps, summary, sum_flag, edit_flag, sys_code from cdm_trans_detail
mapper.insert:
insert into cdm_trans_detail (cust_id, date_time, tran_id, card_no, tran_type, tran_cat, tran_msg, tran_amount, tran_cureen, acct_avaibala, act_name, remit_type, opp_actno, opp_cardno, opp_actname, opp_brname, opp_brno, tran_amountcny, mer_no, mer_name, rembak, usage_name, tran_ps, summary, sum_flag, edit_flag, sys_code) values
(#{ctds.custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctds.tranId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.tranType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.tranCat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.tranMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.tranAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctds.tranCureen,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.acctAvaibala,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctds.actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.remitType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.oppActno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.oppCardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.oppActname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.oppBrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.oppBrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.tranAmountcny,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctds.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.rembak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.usageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.tranPs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctds.sumFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.editFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ctds.sysCode,jdbcType=CHAR})
